conbody.p: The information in this section applies to CDH 4 clusters, where Impala is downloaded and installed separately from CDH itself. You can disregard this section if you are running a CDH 5 cluster. This information is included with the CDH 5 documentation for users who manage CDH 4 clusters through Cloudera Manager 5.
You can download the following releases of the Impala product:

ul.li: (for CDH 4; also bundled with CDH 5 beta 2)

conbody.p: For installation instructions, see .
For information about new features in the latest release, and issues that are fixed or still outstanding, see the .
For information about new features in the latest release, and issues that are fixed or still outstanding, see the .
Release Date: October 2016 Status: Production
Impala 2.7.0 and higher are only available for CDH 5, not for CDH 4. For the Impala bundled with CDH 5, see CDH Version and Packaging Information.
